items.title: MVC Architecture
items.contents: NecurnJS is a lightweight javascript MVC framework, which provides router and templating engine too. It is easy and quick adoptable by any javascript application.

items.title: Necurn Router
items.contents: Necurn Router is powerful and configurable to makes the application rich. It solves all your routing problems. you can easily configure it with the rich options available.

items.title: Necurn Templates
items.contents: NecurnJS provides lightweight, fast & powerful templating engine with flexible features. It can easily compile and embedded with the dynamic views.

items.title: Controllers & Views
